articles.title: Apple Might Have Just Found The Technology To Power Its Thin iPhone 17 Air Display - Benzinga
articles.description: Taiwan's Novatek is preparing to mass-produce OLED displays featuring Touch and Display Driver Integration (TDDI) technology by 2025, which could potentially be used in future Apple iPhones, leading to thinner and more advanced designs.
articles.content:
